department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Construction services for wharf reconstruction in Alberton, PEI
description: The wharf will be replaced with a new steel sheet pile structure.
duration_in_months: Oh, this document contains a plethora of information!
full_summary:
=================
### Title
#### *Renovation of Alberton (Northport) Wharf, Prince Edward Island*

### Reference Information
#### *Contract Details:*
* **Number of Solicitation (RFP Number):** WS4115658414
* **Tender Notice Title:** Renovation of Alberton (Northport) Wharf
* **Tender Notice Date:** July 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 10, 2023, by 2:00 PM Atlantic Time
* **Procurement Category:** Construction Services
#### *Relevant Details of the Project *
* **Location:** Alberton (Northport) Small Craft Harbour, Northport, Prince County
* **Relevant Contract Specs:** Construct a new steel sheet pile (SSP) structure, replacing the existing wharf, and perform other work as described in the contract specifications
### Facts of the Project
#### *Estimated Contract Period:*
* **Expected Commencement Date:** August 16, 2023
* **Expended End Date:** March 31, 2024
#### *Important Contact Information:*
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contract Contact Person:** Stewart Grant
* **Email:** [stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
